page.title: 08HOLLY HOUSE, N.WHITTINGTON.
page.content: Church Street North, Old Whittington. Headmaster Mr. G.R.O'Neil. Original building Georgian but new additions. Pupils 31, teachers & other staff 18. Ch. from all over county, experiencing difficulties at home or school. Two autistic,find communication difficult. Boys age 5-11, girls 5-16. Stay 1 year to 18 months. Follow usual subjects. Several computers. P.E. at leisure centre, Whittington Moor & Mary Swanwick School, nearby. Three dormitories of 10 each. Older girls have own rooms. Children make own beds. School day finishes 3:15. Pupils go to dormitories, or use disco equipment. Swimming, Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, Boys Brigade, in evenings. All children home for weekends, return Sunday evening. Usual holidays. Changes due. Children will attend ordinary schools & receive all help.
